summary:
Ukraine is a big country in Eastern Europe, almost as big as Russia. It has a long history, dating back to the Middle Ages when it was an important Slavic and East Slavic culture center. Over the centuries, many countries controlled the region, including Russia, Poland, and the Ottoman Empire. Ukraine became independent in 1991 when the Soviet Union ended. 

Recently, Ukraine has faced challenges with Russia, including the annexation of Crimea and a war in the east. Ukraine wants to join the European Union and NATO. It has a unique culture, its own language, and a strong military.
title: Ukraine
